alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:59PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of west central Idaho County through 545 PM PDT... At 458 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from 7 miles north of White Bird to 19 miles southeast of Grangeville. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Grangeville, Cottonwood, Keuterville, Harpster and Fenn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
